alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms could impact parts of Taylor County early this evening... A line of thunderstorms extended from Rice Lake to near Phillips and gradually shifting southeast early this evening. These storms have a history of producing gusty winds and hail at times. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Westboro and Rib Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If you have outdoor plans this evening, including school sports, fishing, or camping, watch for approaching storms and have a shelter idea in mind.
